name: ORDER_RAD_PATH_RES
description: This table stores the pathology results linked to an order.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the procedure order record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: FINDING_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier of the pathology result associated with this order.
